descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Jusuf Nurkic throws pinpoint bounce pass to Robert Covington who finishes the reverse jam with Michael Porter Jr. chasing.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Nurkic whips pass to Covington for the reverse jam) 2021/05/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Nurkic whips pass to Covington for the reverse jam

videos.description: Damian Lillard comes soaring down the lane and flushes home the monster dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lillard comes flying down the lane for emphatic slam) 2021/05/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lillard comes flying down the lane for emphatic slam

videos.description: Shaquille Harrison denies Damian Lillard in the lane leading to  the transition 3-pointer for JaMychal Green.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lillard getting turned around sets up JaMychal Green 3) 2021/05/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lillard getting turned around sets up JaMychal Green 3

videos.description: CJ McCollum leaves Monte Morris in the dust with the in-and-out dribble and the jumper.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (CJ McCollum leaves Monte Morris in the dust with this move) 2021/05/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: CJ McCollum leaves Monte Morris in the dust with this move

videos.description: Michael Porter Jr. gets the handoff from Nikola Jokic and hits the 3 while Norman Powell slides underneath him.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Porter knocks down the tough 3 plus the foul) 2021/05/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Porter knocks down the tough 3 plus the foul

videos.description: Michael Porter Jr. goes full extension on putback dunk late in the second quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Porter continues stellar 2nd quarter with putback jam) 2021/05/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Porter continues stellar 2nd quarter with putback jam

videos.description: The Denver Nuggets forget to cover the lane as Norman Powell goes right down the middle for the massive one-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Powell rises high for the jam) 2021/05/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Powell rises high for the jam

videos.description: Nikola Jokic puts Denver up double digits with back-to-back threes in the third.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jokic gets hot in the third with back-to-back triples) 2021/05/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jokic gets hot in the third with back-to-back triples

videos.description: Carmelo Anthony goes with the three fingers to the head celebration after splashing the 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Melo celebrates 3 with go to celebration) 2021/05/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Melo celebrates 3 with go to celebration

videos.description: Carmelo Anthony drains the 3-pointer and is hyped as the Nuggets take a timeout.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Melo fired up after tying game with a 3) 2021/05/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Melo fired up after tying game with a 3

videos.description: Austin Rivers forces a Portland timeout after knocking down two clutch 3-pointers late in the fourth quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Rivers knocks down two huge 3s late in the fourth) 2021/05/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Rivers knocks down two huge 3s late in the fourth

videos.description: Austin Rivers finishes off the stellar fourth quarter by knocking down the 3 and icing the Game 3 win.
videos.headline: Rivers hits the dagger 3

videos.description: Monte Morris misses the free throw, but Nikola Jokic tips it in giving the Nuggets a 5-point lead and a Game 3 win.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jokic ends Portland's hopes with tip-in off missed free throw) 2021/05/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jokic ends Portland's hopes with tip-in off missed free throw
